text: Hopola nakong eo Allah a neng a re: “Oho jesu! Ke tla U nka ke u nyollele ho ‘Na, Ke hlakole ho uena liketseletso tsa bahana-tumelo; Ke tla matlafatsa ba o latelang ka ho phahamela bahana-tumelo ho fihlela mohla letsatsi la tsoho. Ruri poelo ea lona bohle e ho ‘na, ke tla ahlola lipakeng tsa lona ho seo se bakileng likhang
